price: 32. Parmi Ses Signes, sont les vaisseaux (voguant) en mer, (hauts) comme des montagnes.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
